snippet: A three-judge panel of a federal court has picked a new congressional map that significantly changes the racial makeup of two districts.
abstract: Federal court's three-judge panel orders Virginia to establish new redistricting map for 2016 election and chooses new congressional map that significantly alters racial composition of two districts in state.
lead_paragraph: A three-judge panel of a federal court has picked a new congressional map that significantly changes the racial makeup of two districts.

headline.main: Virginia: Court Again Redraws Voting Districts
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Court Again Redraws Voting Districts
